titleStmt.title: Ten necessary quæries touching the personall treatie very usefull and necessary to be considered. Also a right description of a cavalier: with some drops to quench the fiery bull of Colchester. By James Tasvvell, a true lover of King, Parliament, truth and peace.
titleStmt.author: Taswell, James.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
